description:
A cat from Ryuuguu Palace brings wealth.  A greedy man freezes as he eats all the persimmons.  A man sells farts that are sacred to the Buddha.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ryuuguu kara Kita Neko / Sashisaba to Tsurushigaki / Onara Uri
The Cat from the Dragon Palace / Sashisaba and Tsurushigaki / The Fart-Seller
竜宮から来た猫 / さしさばとつるし柿 / おなら売り
